mapper.sql: id, operate_date, operate_thing, pay_amount, beneficiary, pay_type, fee_type, belong, payer, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modify, row_status, row_version
mapper.delete: update fee set row_status=-1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into fee (id, operate_date, operate_thing, pay_amount, beneficiary, pay_type, fee_type, belong, payer, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modify, row_status, row_version) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateThing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount}, #{beneficiary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rowStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{rowVersion})
